title: As Trump pushes tariffs, sons back firm aimed at 'revitalizing' US manufacturing
summary: New America Acquisition I Corp, a blank-check firm aimed at financing US manufacturing projects and backed by Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr., filed for an initial public offering–seeking to capitalize on the president’s protectionist policies
